scripts.cordova-build-android: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service cordova-build-android
scripts.cordova-build-browser: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=browser vue-cli-service cordova-build-browser
scripts.cordova-build-ios: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios vue-cli-service cordova-build-ios
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-android: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-android
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-browser: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=browser vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-browser
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-ios: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-ios
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-osx: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=osx vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-osx
scripts.cordova-build-osx: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=osx vue-cli-service cordova-build-osx
scripts.cordova-serve-android: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service cordova-serve-android
scripts.cordova-serve-browser: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=browser vue-cli-service cordova-serve-browser
scripts.cordova-serve-ios: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios vue-cli-service cordova-serve-ios
scripts.cordova-serve-osx: yarn buildApp && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=osx vue-cli-service cordova-serve-osx
